name: medicationName
description: Generic medication name for long-acting injectable antiretroviral therapy (LAI ART). Currently includes Cabenuva (cabotegravir/rilpivirine), Cabotegravir injectable, Rilpivirine injectable, and Lenacapavir injectable (Sunlenca).

name: administrationDate
description: Medication administration/injection date. Apply date rules in Section 2.5 for fuzzy or unknown dates.

name: source
description: Data source for LAI ART administration. Common sources: 'Pharmacy dispensing record', 'Medication administration record', 'Chart review', 'Procedure code'. If none apply, use a concise, descriptive, consistently formatted text string label.
example: Pharmacy dispensing record, Medication administration record, Chart review
